text: Noureddine Yazid Zerhouni () (5 September 1937https://www.algeriepatriotique.com/2020/12/20/noureddine-yazid-zerhouni- raconte-par-mourad-benachenhou/ – 18 December 2020) was a Tunisian-born Algerian politician. Zerhouni was the Minister of the Interior from 1999 to 2010 and Deputy Prime Minister from 2010 to 2012. He was born in Tunis. Zerhouni died in Algiers on 18 December 2020 at the age of 83.Décès de l'ancien ministre de l'Intérieur Noureddine Yazid Zerhouni ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Algerian politicians Category:Politicians from Tunis Category:Recipients of the Order of the Rising Sun
title: Yazid Zerhouni
